author: Jonathan Easley
title: Trump campaign taunts Twitter with manipulated audio of Biden calling virus a 'hoax'
description: President Trump's reelection campaign tweeted out manipulated audio to make it sound like former Vice President Joe Biden called the coronavirus a "hoax" in an effort to draw attention to what it views as Twitter's double...
